description:
NtpServer:  Table recording Network Time Protocol (NTP) server information for each cell, including timestamps, location, cell identifiers, and versioning details.

dateTime: Timestamp of the NTP server data record.
Area_Name: Name of the geographical area where the cell is located (e.g., NR_Balikpapan).
CellId: Unique identifier for the cell site.
Id2: Redundant cell identifier (possibly a different format).
Id3:  An auxiliary identifier (likely categorical).
Id4: An auxiliary identifier (likely categorical).
vsDataType:  Specifies that the data represents NTP server information.
vsDataFormatVersion: Version identifier for the data format.
NtpServer.ntpServerId: Unique identifier for the specific NTP server.
